column3: Crispy juicy tender chunks of chicken for you to sink your teeth into
Crispy whole-muscle chicken thigh flavoured with buttermilk packed in a glazed burger bun
A thick juicy cutlet of chicken thigh and drum sits fiery hot on a bed of crunchy lettuce between toasted sesame seed buns
Smooth refreshing and filled with playful bits of nata de coco!
Lose yourself in the rich swirls of Hershey's soft-serve chocolate duget and oreo!
Caramel with a hint of coffee thats refreshingly blended with ice
